title: Samsungâ€™s Galaxy Book 2 series has powerful processors, OLED displays, and FHD webcams
content:
Last year, Samsung’s Galaxy Book Pro 360 blew us away when we reviewed it, and today, the company is refreshing the whole lineup. It’s introducing the Galaxy Book 2 Pro, Galaxy Book Pro 2 360, and Galaxy Book 2. There’s a fourth model too, the Galaxy Book 2 Business, but only some details of that

The post Samsung’s Galaxy Book 2 series has powerful processors, OLED displays, and FHD webcams appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is announcing its new Galaxy Book 2 Pro and non-Pro laptops, and that have new Intel 12th-gen processors and more.
